fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may use your ability at any time at least four hours after the phase has begun.
- All phases are naturally 2 hours shorter, however the town is not notified of this. The phase will just end when it ends, and anything submitted after the end time will not register.
- Anything that would happen that phase with the current actions will resolve. (e.g Chronologist's end-of-night action clause in their second attribute doesn't apply)
